lead_paragraph: Ray Allen, a 10-time All-Star and two-time NBA champion, officially announced his retirement after 18 seasons on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: NBA Veteran Allen Retires, Says 'at Peace With Himself'
headline.main: NBA Veteran Allen Retires, Says 'at Peace With Himself'

snippet: Ray Allen, a 10-time All-Star and two-time NBA champion, officially announced his retirement after 18 seasons on Tuesday....
